바게스트

A 바게스트 is a lupine fiend that can take the shape of a 늑대 or a 고블린. In its natural form, it resembles a 고블린–늑대 hybrid with terrible jaws and sharp claws. As whelps, 바게스트 are nearly indistinguishable from wolves, except for their size and claws. As they grow larger and stronger, their skin darkens to bluishred and eventually becomes 파랑이 altogether.

A full-grown 바게스트 is about 6 feet long and weighs 180 pounds. A 바게스트’s eyes glow orange when the creature becomes excited.

바게스트 말하기 고블린, 검은 늑대, and 인퍼널.

전투

COMBAT

바게스트 can claw and bite, no matter what their form, and usually disdain 무기. Though they love killing, they have little stomach for direct 전투 and 공격 from ambush whenever possible. 바게스트 start a 전투 by using 짓누르는 절망 and 몬스터 매혹 to keep opponents off 균형. They try to stay away from the enemy’s main 근력.

A 바게스트’s natural 무기, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as evil-aligned and lawful-aligned for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소. Its natural 무기 are treated as 마법 무기 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Spell-Like 능력: At will—깜빡임, 부유, 눈속임 (DC 14), 격노 (DC 15); 1/day—몬스터 매혹 (DC 16), 짓누르는 절망 (DC 16), 차원의 문. 시전자 레벨 equals the 바게스트’s HD.

The save DCs are 매력-based.

Feed (Su): When a 바게스트 slays a humanoid opponent, it can feed on the corpse, devouring both flesh and life force, as a full-round action. Feeding destroys the victim’s body and prevents any form of raising or 부활 that requires part of the corpse. There is a 50% chance that a 소원, 기적, or 진정한 부활 spell can restore a devoured victim to life. Check once for each destroyed creature. If the check fails, the creature cannot be brought back to life by mortal magic.

A 바게스트 advances in 히트 다이스 by consuming corpses in this fashion. For every three suitable corpses a 바게스트 devours, it gains 1 Hit Die, and its 근력, 건강, and natural 갑옷 increase by +1. Its 공격 보너스 and 내성 굴림 improve as normal for an outsider of its 히트 다이스, and it gains skill points, 특기, and ability score improvements normally.

The 바게스트 only advances by consuming the corpses of creatures whose 히트 다이스 or 레벨 are equal to or 상급 than its own current total. A 바게스트 that reaches 9 히트 다이스 through feeding immediately becomes a 거대 바게스트 upon completion of the act.

Change Shape (Su): A 바게스트 can assume the shape of a 고블린 or a 늑대 as a standard action. In 고블린 form, a 바게스트 cannot use its natural 무기 but can wield 무기 and wear 갑옷. In 늑대 form, a 바게스트 loses its claw 공격 but retains its bite 공격.

흔적 없는 이동 (Ex): A 바게스트 in 늑대 form can use 흔적 없는 이동 (as the spell) as a free action.

스킬: *A 바게스트 in 늑대 form gains a +4 circumstance bonus on 숨기 checks.

거대 바게스트

GREATER BARGHEST

A 바게스트 that reaches 9 히트 다이스 through feeding becomes a 거대 바게스트. These creatures can change shape into a goblinlike creature of Large size (about 8 feet tall and 400 pounds) or a 흉폭한 늑대. In 고블린 form, a 거대 바게스트 cannot use its natural 무기 but can wield 무기 and wear 갑옷. In 흉폭한 늑대 form, a 거대 바게스트 loses its claw 공격 but retains its bite 공격.

A 거대 바게스트 can reach a maximum of 18 히트 다이스 through feeding.

Spell-Like 능력: In addition to the spelllike 능력 all 바게스트 possess, a 거대 바게스트 gains the following 능력. At will—투명의 구; 1/day—광역 황소의 근력, 광역 enlarge. 시전자 레벨 equals the 거대 바게스트’s HD.

전투

COMBAT

Occasionally, a 거대 바게스트 uses a magic two-handed weapon in 전투 instead of its claws, giving it multiple 공격 (공격 보너스 +13/+8). It can also make one bite 공격 (공격 보너스 +8) each round. The save DC against a 거대 바게스트’s spell-like 능력 is 14 + spell 레벨.

A 바실리스크 is a reptilian monster that petrifies living creatures with a mere gaze. A 바실리스크 usually has a dull brown body with a yellowish underbelly. Some specimens sport a short, curved horn atop the nose. An adult 바실리스크’s body grows to about 6 feet long, not including its tail, which can reach an additional length of 5 to 7 feet. The creature weighs about 300 pounds.

전투

COMBAT

A 바실리스크 relies on its gaze 공격, biting only when opponents come within reach. Though it has eight legs, its 감속화 metabolism renders it relatively sluggish, so it does not expend energy unnecessarily. Intruders who flee a 바실리스크 rather than fight can expect, at best, a halfhearted pursuit. These creatures tend to spend most of their time lying in wait for prey, which includes small mammals, birds, reptiles, and similar creatures.

Petrifying Gaze (Su): Turn to stone permanently, 거리 30 feet; Fortitude DC 13 negates. The save DC is 매력-based.

스킬: *The 바실리스크’s dull coloration and its ability to remain motionless for long periods of time grant it a +4 racial bonus on 숨기 checks in natural settings.

심연의 거대 바실리스크

ABYSSAL GREATER BASILISK

전투

COMBAT

The save DC for the 심연의 거대 바실리스크’s petrifying gaze (DC 21) is adjusted for its 상급 히트 다이스 and higher 매력 score.

An 심연의 거대 바실리스크’s natural 무기 are treated as 마법 무기 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Smite Good (Su): Once per day an 심연의 거대 바실리스크 can make a normal melee 공격 to deal an extra 18 points of 피해 against a good foe.

The 베히어 is a serpentine monster that can slither like a 뱀 or use its dozen legs to 이동 with considerable 속도. A 베히어 is about 40 feet long and weighs about 4,000 pounds. It can fold its limbs close to its long, narrow body and slither in 뱀 fashion if it desires. The coloration of 베히어 거리 from ultramarine to deep 파랑이 with bands of gray-brown. The belly is pale 파랑이. The two large horns curving back over the head look dangerous but are actually used for preening the creature’s scales, not for fighting.

베히어 말하기 Common.

전투

COMBAT

A 베히어 usually bites and grabs its prey first, then either swallows or constricts the opponent. It can employ its claws only against foes caught in its coils. If beset by a large number of foes, it uses its 브레스 무기.

브레스 무기 (Su): 20-foot line, once every 10 rounds, 피해 7d6 electricity, Reflex DC 19 half. The save DC is 건강-based.

Constrict (Ex): A 베히어 deals 2d8+8 points of 피해 with a successful 드잡이 check. It can make six rake 공격 against a grappled foe as well.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 베히어 must hit a creature of any size with its bite 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity.

If it wins the 드잡이 check, it it establishes a hold and can attempt to constrict the opponent or swallow the opponent in the following round.

Rake (Ex): Six claws, 공격 보너스 +15 melee, 피해 1d4+4.

Swallow Whole (Ex): A 베히어 can try to swallow a grabbed Medium or smaller opponent by making a successful 드잡이 check.

A 베히어 that swallows an opponent can use its 쪼개기 feat to bite and grab another opponent.

A swallowed creature takes 2d8+8 points of bludgeoning 피해 and 8 points of acid 피해 per round from the 베히어’s gizzard. A swallowed creature can cut its way out by using a 빛 slashing or piercing weapon to deal 25 points of 피해 to the gizzard (AC 15). Once the creature exits, muscular action closes the hole; another swallowed opponent must cut its own way out.

A 베히어’s gizzard can hold 2 Medium, 8 Small, 32 Tiny, or 128 Diminutive or smaller opponents.

스킬: 베히어 have a +8 racial bonus on 등반 checks and can always choose to take 10 on 등반 checks, even if rushed or threatened.

벨커 are creatures from the Plane of Air. They are composed primarily of smoke. Although undeniably evil, they are very reclusive and usually have no interest in the affairs of others. A 벨커’s winged shape makes it look distinctly demonic. It is about 7 feet long and weighs about 8 pounds.

벨커 말하기 Auran.

전투

COMBAT

In most cases, a 벨커 fights with its nasty claws and painful bite.

Smoke Claws (Ex): A 벨커 in smoke form (see below) can engulf opponents by moving on top of them. It fills the air around one Medium or smaller opponent without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Fortitude save or inhale part of the creature. The save DC is 건강-based. Smoke inside the victim solidifies into a claw and begins to rip at the surrounding organs, dealing 3d4 points of 피해 per round. An affected creature can attempt another Fortitude save each subsequent round to cough out the semivaporous menace.

Smoke Form (Su): Most of the time a 벨커 is more or less solid, but at will it can assume smoke form. It can switch forms once per round as a free action and can spend up to 20 rounds per day in smoke form. A 벨커 in smoke form can 비행 at a 속도 of 50 feet (perfect). The ability is otherwise similar to a 기체 형태 spell (시전자 레벨 7th).

스킬: 벨커 have a +4 racial bonus on 조용히 이동 checks.

The 점멸하는 개 is an intelligent canine that has a limited teleportation ability.

점멸하는 개 have their own language, a mixture of barks, yaps, whines, and growls that can transmit complex information.

전투

COMBAT

점멸하는 개 hunt in packs, teleporting in a seemingly random fashion until they surround their prey, allowing some of them to take advantage of 협공.

깜빡임 (Su): A 점멸하는 개 can use 깜빡임 as the spell (시전자 레벨 8th), and can evoke or end the effect as a free action.

차원의 문 (Su): A 점멸하는 개 can 순간이동, as 차원의 문 (시전자 레벨 8th), once per round as a free action. The ability affects only the 점멸하는 개, which never appears within a solid object and can act immediately after teleporting.

보닥 are the undead remnants of humanoids who have been destroyed by the touch of absolute evil.

A 보닥 retains fleeting memories of its past life and can 말하기 Common (or some other humanoid language).

전투

COMBAT

Death Gaze (Su): Death, 거리 30 feet, Fortitude DC 15 negates. Humanoids who die from this 공격 are transformed into 보닥 24 hours later. The save DC is 매력-based.

Vulnerability to Sunlight (Ex): 보닥 loathe sunlight, for its merest touch burns their impure flesh. Each round of exposure to the direct 광선 of the sun deals 1 point of 피해 to the creature.

Also known as the landshark, the 불레 is a terrifying predator that lives only to eat.

COMBAT

A 불레 공격 anything it regards as edible, choosing the easiest or closest prey first. The only creatures it refuses to eat are 엘프 (and it dislikes the taste of 드워프). When burrowing underground, a landshark relies on its 열감지 ability to detect prey.

When it senses something edible (that is, senses 이동), it breaks to the surface, crest first, and begins its 공격.

셀레스티얼 생물체

CELESTIAL CREATURE

셀레스티얼 생물체 dwell on the upper 이세계, the realms of good, although they resemble beings found on 물질 세계. They are more regal and more beautiful than their earthly counterparts.

셀레스티얼 생물체 often come in metallic colors (usually silver, gold, or platinum). They can be mistaken for 하프 셀레스티얼, more powerful creatures that are created when a celestial mates with a non-셀레스티얼 생물체.

셀레스티얼 생물체 만들기

CREATING A CELESTIAL CREATURE

“Celestial” is an inherited template that can be added to any corporeal animal, aberration, animal, 드래곤, fey, 거인, humanoid, magical beast, monstrous humanoid, plant, or vermin of good or neutral 성향 (referred to hereafter as the base creature).

A 셀레스티얼 생물체 uses all the base creature’s statistics and 능력 except as noted here. Do not recalculate the creature’s 히트 다이스, base 공격 보너스, 내성 굴림, or skill points if its type changes.

크기와 유형: Animals or vermin with this template become magical beasts, but otherwise the creature type is unchanged. Size is unchanged. 셀레스티얼 생물체 encountered on 물질 세계 have the extraplanar subtype.

특수 공격: A 셀레스티얼 생물체 retains all the 특수 공격 of the base creature and also gains the following 공격.

Smite Evil (Su): Once per day a 셀레스티얼 생물체 can make a normal melee 공격 to deal extra 피해 equal to its HD (maximum of +20) against an evil foe.

—암흑시야 out to 60 feet.

—피해 축소 (see the table below).

—주문 저항 equal to HD + 5 (maximum 25).

The horrific creatures known as 혼돈 야수 have mutable, ever-형태 변환. A 혼돈 야수’s dimensions vary, but it always weighs about 200 pounds.

혼돈 야수 do not 말하기.

전투

COMBAT

For all its fearsome appearances, whether it has claws, fangs, pincers, tentacles, or spines, a 혼돈 야수 does little physical 해악. Regardless of form, the creature seems unable to manage more than two 공격 per round. Its continual 변환술 prevent the coordination needed to do more.

A 혼돈 야수’s claw 공격, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as chaotic-aligned for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Corporeal Instability (Su): A blow from a 혼돈 야수 against a living creature can cause a terrible 변형. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude save or become a spongy, amorphous 광역. Unless the victim manages to control the effect (see below), its shape melts, flows, writhes, and boils. The save DC is 건강-based.

An affected creature is unable to hold or use any item. 의류, 갑옷, 반지, and helmets become useless. Large items worn or carried—갑옷, backpacks, even shirts—hamper more than help, reducing the victim’s 민첩 score by 4. Soft or misshapen feet and legs reduce 속도 to 10 feet or one-quarter normal, whichever is less. Searing pain courses along the nerves, so strong that the victim cannot act coherently. The victim cannot cast 주문 or use 마법 아이템, and it 공격 blindly, unable to distinguish friend from foe (–4 penalty on 명중 굴림 and a 50% miss chance, regardless of the 명중 굴림).

Each round the victim spends in an amorphous state causes 1 point of 지혜 drain from mental shock. If the victim’s 지혜 score falls to 0, it becomes a 혼돈 야수.

A victim can regain its own shape by taking a standard action to attempt a DC 15 매력 check (this check DC does not vary for a 혼돈 야수 with different 히트 다이스 or 능력 점수). A success reestablishes the creature’s normal form for 1 minute. On a failure, the victim can still repeat this check each round until successful.

Corporeal instability is not a 질병 or a curse and so is hard to remove. A 형태변경 or 돌피부 spell does not cure an afflicted creature but fixes its form for the 지속시간 of the spell. A 복원, 치료, or 상급 복원 spell removes the affliction (a separate 복원 is necessary to restore any drained points of 지혜).

Immunity to 변형 (Ex): No mortal magic can permanently affect or fix a 혼돈 야수’s form. Effects such as polymorphing or petrification force the creature into a new shape, but at the start of its next turn it immediately returns to its mutable form as a free action.

A 초커 likes to perch near the ceiling, often at intersections, archways, wells, or staircases, and reach down to 공격 its prey. A 초커 공격 creatures of almost any size, but prefers lone prey of its size or larger. If one is very hungry, it may 공격 a group, but it waits to grab the last creature in line.

If it wins the 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and can constrict. 초커 receive a +4 racial bonus on 드잡이 checks, which is already included in the 수치 표.

A horrible mix of crustacean, insect, and serpent, the 추얼 is an 혐오체 that lurks submerged or partially submerged, awaiting intelligent prey to devour. Although amphibious, 추얼 are not good swimmers and actually prefer to be on land or in very shallow water when they 공격. A 추얼 is about 8 feet long and weighs 650 pounds.

COMBAT

A 추얼 prefers to wait by the shore, submerged in murky water, until it hears nearby prey (in or out of the water) that it can 공격 with 기습. A 추얼 grabs with its claws and constricts its foe, then passes the opponent to its paralytic tentacles. It tries to always have one claw free, so if it faces a large number of opponents, it drops a paralyzed or 죽음 victim and continues attempting to grab, constrict, and paralyze the rest.

Constrict (Ex): On a successful 드잡이 check, a 추얼 deals 3d6+5 points of 피해.

While held in the tentacles, paralyzed or not, a victim automatically takes 1d8+2 points of 피해 each round from the creature’s mandibles.

When resting or lying in wait, these creatures are almost impossible to distinguish from common black cloaks (the 클로커’s ivory claws look very much like bone clasps). Only when it unfurls does the horrific nature of the creature become apparent.

A 클로커 has a wingspan of about 8 feet. It weighs about 100 pounds.

클로커 말하기 Undercommon.

전투

COMBAT

클로커 usually lie still, watching and listening for prey. If facing a single opponent, a 클로커 uses its engulf 공격. Against multiple foes, it lashes with its tail in concert with its moan and 어둠 shift 능력 to reduce the opposition’s numbers, then engulfs a survivor. Multiple 클로커 usually split up, leaving one or two behind to use 특수 능력 while the rest make melee 공격.

Moan (Ex): A 클로커 can emit a dangerous subsonic moan as a standard action. By changing the frequency, the 클로커 can cause one of four effects. 클로커 are immune to these sonic, mindaffecting 공격. Unless otherwise specified, a creature that successfully 내성 굴림 against one of these effects cannot be affected by the same moan effect from the same 클로커 for 24 hours. All save DCs for moan effects are 매력-based.

Unnerve: Anyone within a 60-foot spread automatically takes a –2 penalty on 공격 and 피해 rolls. Those forced to hear the moan for more than 6 consecutive rounds must succeed on a DC 15 Will save or enter a trance, unable to 공격 or defend themselves until the moaning stops.

공포: Anyone within a 30-foot spread must succeed on a DC 15 Will save or become panicked for 2 rounds.

Nausea: Anyone in a 30-foot cone must succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude save or be overcome by nausea and weakness.

Affected characters fall prone and become nauseated for 1d4+1 rounds.

Stupor: A single creature within 30 feet of the 클로커 must succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude save or be affected as though by a 몬스터 포박 spell for 5 rounds. Even after a successful save, the creature must repeat the save if the 클로커 uses this effect again.

Engulf (Ex): A 클로커 can try to wrap a Medium or smaller creature in its body as a standard action. The 클로커 attempts a 드잡이 that does not provoke an 공격 of opportunity. If it wins the 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and bites the engulfed victim with a +4 bonus on its 명중 굴림. It can still use its whiplike tail to strike at other targets.

공격 that hit an engulfing 클로커 deal half their 피해 to the monster and half to the trapped victim.

어둠 Shift (Su): A 클로커 can manipulate 어둠. This ability is effective only in shadowy 범위 and has three possible effects.

Obscure 시야: The 클로커 gains 은폐 (20% miss chance) for 1d4 rounds.
